contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 13, 2018 D Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section)
Butlins Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Set Test and Entertainments Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-championship-section
Championship
Contest Music
Butlins Skegness (Centre Stage), Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Entertainments Judges: Kevin Wadsworth, Paul Andrews Test Piece Judges: Paul Holland, Ian Porthouse
Entertainment placing takes precedence in the event of a tie.
Highest placed mining band - Desford. Most entertaining band - Flowers. Best soloist (test piece) - Flugel (Desford). Best soloist (entertainment) - Paul Richards (soprano) Flowers.
Jan. 17, 2017, 12:36 p.m. Jan. 19, 2018, 11:46 a.m.
1 Flowers Band David Childs The Year of the Dragon
2 Desford Colliery Band Michael Fowles Contest Music
3 Woodfalls Band Robert Childs Concerto No. 1 for Brass Band [Venables]
4 Friary Brass Band Chris King The Year of the Dragon
5 Redbridge Brass Jeremy Wise Contest Music
